item.title: Help please
item.dc:creator: @power_of_the_blood power of the blood
item.description:
@power_of_the_blood wrote:

Ive looked through all the compiling threads and can’t find one that will help me at all. i downloaded combattscape and it came with a compiler that wouldnt work for windows 7. it kept saying path not specified. so now im using this one:

@echo off
color 0a
title Unlimited-pkz Compiler
if exist “%programfiles%\Java” (call :compile “%programfiles%\Java”) else (goto error)
:compile
for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe")
if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java)
if defined p (goto end)
:error
:end
echo You have sucsessfully compiled
pause
exit

problem with this one is it says “you have successfully compiled”, but it didnt, and everything i change is still the same. I’m clueless on what to do, so can somone please help me, or give me a link tat will help me?thankyou.

Read full topic
